name: Mai Villa - Mai Thanh Guest House 3
address: No.101, Vien Thong 37 Residences, 118 Nguyen Khanh Toan Alley, Quan Hoa, Cau Giay, Cau Giay District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Designed for both business and leisure travel, Mai Villa - Mai Thanh Guest House 3 is ideally situated in Cau Giay District; one of the city's most popular locales. Set 6.1 km from the excitement of the city, this 1-star hotel commands an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Mai Villa - Mai Thanh Guest House 3 offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. A selection of top-class facilities such as free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, laundry service, concierge can be enjoyed at the hotel.

In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts. Many rooms even provide internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, mini bar to please the most discerning guest. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Mai Villa - Mai Thanh Guest House 3 is an ideal place of stay for travelers seeking charm, comfort and convenience in Hanoi.
